item.title: Awsome single cell RNA-seq clustering
item.author: zqzneptune@hotmail.com (Qingzhou Zhang)
item.description: Introduction There are growing numbers of single cell RNA-seq (scRNA-Seq) researches. Due to the nature of scRNA-Seq design, the volume and velocity of generated data spans several orders of magnitude than current bulk RNA-seq. This, however, poses great challenges post sequencing data analysis. Test Figures par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'), col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'), init.
